title: Led Time
summary: A classical Led Clock with two optional led screens.
description: A classic led clock watch face with configurable displays.You can read hours and minutes as text while seconds are represented on the outer rim.Ambient mode is achieved by lowering brightness and removing seconds dots (now in full colors).You can change leds color and mini screens mode from one of the following:- Off- Year- Week- Day and Date- Battery Level- Month and Date- Month and Year- MM/DD/YY- DD/MM/YY(- DDMMM'YY coming in next release)Do not hesitate to suggest new modes.This watch face is the extended version of another face of ours available for free on this store (Led Clock)If you like our watches, we publish updates and previews at https://twitter.com/SeenAppsDo not hesitate to reach out to support@seenapps.com for questions and comments.
descriptionHTML:
A classic led clock watch face with configurable displays.

You can read hours and minutes as text while seconds are represented on the outer rim.
Ambient mode is achieved by lowering brightness and removing seconds dots (now in full colors).

You can change leds color and mini screens mode from one of the following:
- Off
- Year
- Week
- Day and Date
- Battery Level
- Month and Date
- Month and Year
- MM/DD/YY
- DD/MM/YY
(- DDMMM'YY coming in next release)

Do not hesitate to suggest new modes.

This watch face is the extended version of another face of ours available for free on this store (Led Clock)

If you like our watches, we publish updates and previews at https://twitter.com/SeenApps
Do not hesitate to reach out to support@seenapps.com for questions and comments.
comments: Excellent and the update is perfect Love the reto look and the response to getting an update to suite my Sony SW3 was second to none.. Great job.
Good watch face, just need to ability to configure the face on my phone and controller the brightness levels.
Favourite Partial to a bit of retro, this watch face is the business! Looks great.
No low bit ambient mode No face is worth screen burn in
Love it !!! This takes me back to the early 80's....good job üëç
Great for my lg urbane Great app works well, no issues, given some feedback which has led to further improvement, very quick response which is great, thanks!
